summary.para: A default localizer to translate UI resources for the Data Access library.

summary.para: Returns the name of the language currently used by this localizer object.

member.value: A value that specifies the language of the user interface localization.

summary.para: Gets or sets a localizer object providing localization of the user interface at runtime.
